channel.title: HELP plzz
channel.description:
my problem is when i port forward i do everything right i think and when i try to make people connect to my server it never works
and i add my no-ip info in the client and source folders and then when i try to log in it dosent let me or anyone
can anyone help me on skype??

item.title: HELP plzz
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

Make sure that the client has your ip in it and not localhost or 127.0.0.1.

go to canyouseeme.org and type in the port people are trying to connect to (probably 43594) and see what the site tells you. if it cant see you then try port forwarding again.

Read full topic
